#summary What is the difference between Lite and Full releases?

Each release of FDO Toolbox will have two versions. A "Lite" release and a "Full" release.

The "Full" release includes the required FDO binaries.

The "Lite" release does not (to save download time)

Downloading the "Lite" release is recommended if you already have downloaded the FDO binaries 

Each release is labeled with the appropriate version of FDO, so if you downloaded the lite release, you need to download or copy across that version of the FDO binaries
